channel.title: Only Owner Can Spawn items? Fix?
channel.description:
Have some one maby a code in the commands.java for me so i can spawn items with admin mod ect..?
i'm using the TrisidiaX V3 Source Pleasss Help me!
Or Help me on skype: Lucas.vinke

item.title: Only Owner Can Spawn items? Fix?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Wrong Section Use Server Help.

Also just make a command and in your if statement add && playerRights >= 2)

Example:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("example") && c.playerRights >= 2) { c.sendMessage("HELLO"); }

This is just an example you may have to modify some variables.

Read full topic
item.source: Only Owner Can Spawn items? Fix?
